******************************************************************************/import ContactFlowService from"../../service/contact-flow.service";import{ApiService}from"../../service/api.service";import FileSaverService from"../../service/file-saver.service";var fileSaverService=new FileSaverService();var contactFlowService=new ContactFlowService(new ApiService(),fileSaverService);var ContactFlowActionKey={SHOW_CONTACT_FLOW_MODAL:"SHOW_CONTACT_FLOW_MODAL",DOWNLOADING:"DOWNLOADING",DOWNLOAD:"DOWNLOAD",DOWNLOAD_ERROR:"DOWNLOAD_ERROR"};var downloadErrorResults=function downloadErrorResults(error){return{type:ContactFlowActionKey.DOWNLOAD_ERROR,value:error};};var downloadingResults=function downloadingResults(downloading){return{type:ContactFlowActionKey.DOWNLOADING,value:downloading};};var downloadResult=function downloadResult(contactFlow){return{type:ContactFlowActionKey.DOWNLOAD,value:{contactFlow:contactFlow}};};var showModalResults=function showModalResults(show){return{type:ContactFlowActionKey.SHOW_CONTACT_FLOW_MODAL,value:show};};var ContactFlowAction={download:function download(contactFloDto){return function(dispatch){// console.log("The document", document);
dispatch(downloadErrorResults(null));dispatch(downloadingResults(true));contactFlowService.downloadContactFlow(contactFloDto).then(function(contactFlow){dispatch(downloadResult(contactFlow));}).catch(function(err){// console.log("The error", err);
dispatch(downloadErrorResults(err));}).finally(function(){dispatch(downloadingResults(false));});};},showModal:function showModal(show){return function(dispatch){dispatch(showModalResults(show));};}};export{ContactFlowAction,ContactFlowActionKey};
